description: This Java source file defines the NoteController class, a REST API controller providing CRUD endpoints for managing notes. It includes methods for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, with annotations for request mappings, validation, and API documentation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST controller exposing CRUD endpoints for notes, handling HTTP requests related to note operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on provided NoteRequest data and returns the created NoteResponse.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
